definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Your code can guide you to fixes that are cheap and light.
sentences.chinese: 代码可以引导你找到那些又便宜又轻便的修正方法。

sentences.english: Its light and resistant gear was taken as a novelty.
sentences.chinese: 它的轻便耐磨的齿轮被看做是一个传奇。

sentences.english: Portable metal or aluminium ladders should be equipped with non-skid feet.
sentences.chinese: 金属或铝制的轻便梯子应当装防滑凳。

sentences.english: Does it have a pillow topper?
sentences.chinese: 它是否有一件枕头轻便短大衣？

sentences.english: Floral-patterned rubber outsole provides lightweight durability and traction.
sentences.chinese: 花卉图案的橡胶外底提供轻便耐用性和牵引力。

sentences.english: A light gabardine raincoat of the type made by Burberry's of London.
sentences.chinese: 一种由防水棉布做成的轻便雨衣。

sentences.english: She would be able to launch seaplanes by using light jettisonable trolleys .
sentences.chinese: 它能用轻便的抛射推车发射水上飞机。

sentences.english: Overall, the project proposed by Piercy Conner impressed the jury by its simplicity and lightness.
sentences.chinese: 就是得益于其设计的简洁性和轻便性。

sentences.english: Hand-painted polyurethane outsole ensures lightweight durability and flexible walking.
sentences.chinese: 手绘聚氨酯大底，确保轻便耐用性和灵活行走。

sentences.english: Netbook – They’re conveniently small, yet meet all of my needs.
sentences.chinese: 上网本灵巧轻便，并且可以满足我的所有的需求。

sentences.english: Aerodynamic balances are simpler and lighter than mass balances or power boost .
sentences.chinese: 气动补偿比重量补偿或助力器简单而且轻便。

sentences.english: However, less effort is required because of the higher gear ratio.
sentences.chinese: 可是，高的角传动比可以使转向更轻便。

sentences.english: She would be able to launch seaplanes by using light jettisonable trolleys.
sentences.chinese: 它能用轻便的抛射推车发射水上飞机。

sentences.english: Classic-fitting golf pant in soft, lightweight cotton tissue chino.
sentences.chinese: 经典装修高尔夫球裤，柔软，轻便的棉花组织奇诺。

sentences.english: M-cube is highly mobile, adaptable and is lightweight as well.
sentences.chinese: M型立方体移动性，适用性都很强劲，并且十分轻便。

sentences.english: With flexible and convenient operations. the surfaces processed with the machine appear smooth and straight.
sentences.chinese: 全机使用灵活轻便，加工面光滑平直。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
worn next to the skin/close-fitting/personal (servant etc)
